name: Molydeus (variant)
resistance: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
conimmunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The molydeus's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 22). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: dispel magic, polymorph, telekinesis, teleport * 3/day: lightning bolt * 1/day: imprisonment

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the molydeus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The molydeus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The molydeus's weapon attacks are magical.
